Quick search

Inversion¶

This module collects the functions necessary to solve the inverse problem that arise when detecting the real velocity change in a duffusive medium.

@author: Eraldo Pomponi

@copyright: The MIIC Development Team (eraldo.pomponi@uni-leipzig.de)

@license: GNU Lesser General Public License, Version 3 (http://www.gnu.org/copyleft/lesser.html)

BlockCanvas oriented¶

resolution_matrix Simple resolution matrix creation
resolution_matrix_reduced Simple resolution matrix creation
invert Invert the simple forward problem O=MR
quantify_vchange_drop Rolling interval (instead of point) derivative
reconstruction_error Reconstruction error calculation
inversion_with_missed_data Simple inversion with hard thresholded velocity changes data.

Helper functions¶

hard_threshold_dv Put dv[corr < threshould] to nan
